customer_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each customer in the database.

customer_unique_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier used to track customers across different orders.

customer_zip_code_prefix.semantic_description: The prefix of the customer's zip code for location identification purposes.

customer_city.semantic_description: The city in which the customer resides.

customer_state.semantic_description: The state in which the customer resides.

olist_customers_dataset.role: Represents customers in the ecommerce system.
olist_customers_dataset.description: Stores demographic information about each customer, including unique identifiers and location details such as city and state.

geolocation_zip_code_prefix.semantic_description: The prefix of the zip code for identifying different geolocations.

geolocation_city.semantic_description: The city associated with the geolocation data.

geolocation_state.semantic_description: The state associated with the geolocation data.

olist_geolocation_dataset.description: Provides detailed geolocation data that can be used to identify the location of customers and sellers by zip code, latitude, and longitude along with city and state information.

order_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each order associated with the order items.

order_item_id.semantic_description: A sequence number for items in an order.

product_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each product within an order item.

seller_id.semantic_description: The unique identifier of the seller associated with the order item.

shipping_limit_date.semantic_description: The last date until the order can be shipped.

price.semantic_description: The selling price of the order item.

freight_value.semantic_description: The cost of freight for shipping the order item.

olist_order_items_dataset.role: Represents individual items contained within orders.
olist_order_items_dataset.description: Contains detailed information regarding each product in a customer's order, such as product IDs, associated seller, and shipping details.

order_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each order associated with payments.

payment_sequential.semantic_description: A number representing the payment sequence in the order.

payment_type.semantic_description: The method used for payment, such as credit card or voucher.

payment_installments.semantic_description: The number of installments for the payment.

payment_value.semantic_description: The total monetary amount of the payment.

olist_order_payments_dataset.role: Represents payment transactions related to orders.
olist_order_payments_dataset.description: Records details of payments made for each order, including payment type, number of installments, and total payment value.

review_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each review.

order_id.semantic_description: The order associated with the review.

review_score.semantic_description: A score from 1 to 5 representing the customer's review rating.

review_comment_title.semantic_description: An optional title for the review comment.

review_comment_message.semantic_description: The main body of the review comment provided by the customer.

review_creation_date.semantic_description: The date when the review was created.

review_answer_timestamp.semantic_description: The timestamp when the review was addressed or answered.

olist_order_reviews_dataset.role: Collects feedback from customers regarding their purchase experience.
olist_order_reviews_dataset.description: Captures reviews provided by customers for each order, including review score and optional comments, allowing analysis of customer satisfaction.

order_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier for every order in the system.

customer_id.semantic_description: The customer who placed the order.

order_status.semantic_description: The current status of the order such as delivered, shipped, or cancelled.

order_purchase_timestamp.semantic_description: The date and time when the order was made.

order_approved_at.semantic_description: The timestamp when the order was approved.

order_delivered_carrier_date.semantic_description: The date when the order was shipped to the carrier.

order_delivered_customer_date.semantic_description: The date the order was delivered to the customer.

order_estimated_delivery_date.semantic_description: The estimated delivery date of the order as promised to the customer.

olist_orders_dataset.description: Contains overall details of each customer order, including the status, timestamps for key activities related to orders, and estimated delivery dates.

product_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each product listed in the catalog.

product_category_name.semantic_description: The name of the category to which the product belongs.

product_name_lenght.semantic_description: The length of the product name in characters.

product_description_lenght.semantic_description: The length of the product description in characters.

product_photos_qty.semantic_description: The number of photos available for the product.

product_weight_g.semantic_description: The weight of the product in grams.

product_length_cm.semantic_description: The length of the product in centimeters.

product_height_cm.semantic_description: The height of the product in centimeters.

product_width_cm.semantic_description: The width of the product in centimeters.

olist_products_dataset.role: Catalogs product details available for purchase.
olist_products_dataset.description: Details specifications and attributes of products available in the ecommerce platform, including dimensions, weight, category, and visual representation.

seller_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each seller in the marketplace.

seller_zip_code_prefix.semantic_description: The prefix of the zip code indicating the seller's location.

seller_city.semantic_description: The city of the seller's location.

seller_state.semantic_description: The state where the seller's business is located.

olist_sellers_dataset.description: Contains identification and location details of sellers operating within the ecommerce platform, useful for logistics and operation metrics.

product_category_name.semantic_description: The primary language category name of the product.

product_category_name_english.semantic_description: The English translation of the product category name.

product_category_name_translation.role: Provides translations of product category names.
product_category_name_translation.description: List of product category names with their respective English translations, facilitating bilingual or multilingual systems.

database_description: This dataset represents an e-commerce database structure, capturing a comprehensive view of the platform's operations and customer interactions. It includes detailed tables for customers, orders, items, payments, reviews, products, and sellers alongside geolocation data and product category translations. This structure supports analysis of sales, customer behavior, and logistical operations within the e-commerce environment.
